result.title: Different answers from my compiler and from the online judge on 158A
result.content:
include

using namespace std;

int main() { int players; int x=0,k, ctr=0;

cin >> players >>k;

int a[100];

for(int i=0; i<players; i++)
    cin >> a[i]; //scanning

for(int i=0; i<players; i++)
    if(a[i] >= a[k])
       ctr++;

for(int i =0; i<players; i++)
{
     x += a[i];
}

if(x==0)
    ctr =0;

cout << ctr;

}

/* When I run this code on my visual studio 2010 it displays '5' but when I go to submit it, all the online compilers they all display '0' */
